summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented by lifting a shared `selectedSymbol` state to `frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx`, wiring Market/Checklist selectors and panels to that state, and adding an `onSelectSymbol` callback prop to `OpportunityRecognitionPanel` that is invoked on row click while still opening the details dialog.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking metadata (`project_state.json`) adding new_feature_requests entries (AR-1/AR-2/AR-3) marked pending, which is not part of the requested frontend symbol-sync behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for symbol sync changes in Dashboard tabs and a callback prop in `OpportunityRecognitionPanel`; it does not request changes to project management/state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `frontend-file-summaries.txt` with broad claims about many unrelated UI/theme/hook/storage changes beyond the symbol-sync scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request documentation/summary updates nor unrelated feature/theme/hook additions; this file change is outside stated requirements.
